column5: any info on what type of road 622 is. we usually travel north on 502 and was looking at this as a option.
622 is a secondary highway. It doesn't have much traffic on it and is 135km long.

The road is in good shape and as noted earlier, it gets very little traffic. If you are heading to the Ignace or Savant Lake area, it is not a bad option. If your destination is farther west it makes sense to stick to 502 or 71
